message.content:
1. Group A attended a nurse educator-conducted class on diabetes and hypertension.
2. Group B attended the same class on diabetes and hypertension as Group A.
3. Group B was asked to monitor their home blood pressure using a provided device.
4. Group C served as a control group.
5. The control group received usual care.
6. The class was conducted by a nurse educator.
7. The class topics included diabetes and hypertension.
8. A device for home blood pressure monitoring was provided to Group B.

messages.content:
Statement: Group A attended a nurse educator-conducted class on diabetes and hypertension, group B attended the same class and was asked to monitor their home blood pressure using provided device, and group C served as control (usual care).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
